mapper.select: SELECT ADMINID AS adminID, ADMINNAME AS adminName, ADMINDEPARTMENT AS adminDepartment, ADMINLEVEL AS adminLevel, UNIVERSITYSEQ AS universitySeq FROM ADMIN WHERE ADMINID=#{adminID} AND ADMINPASSWORD=#{adminPassword}

SELECT A.* FROM (SELECT A.ADMINID AS adminID, A.ADMINNAME AS adminName, A.ADMINDEPARTMENT AS adminDepartment, A.ADMINLEVEL AS adminLevel, A.UNIVERSITYSEQ AS universitySeq, U.UNIVERSITYNAME AS universityName FROM ADMIN A INNER JOIN UNIVERSITY U ON A.UNIVERSITYSEQ = U.UNIVERSITYSEQ
ORDER BY U.UNIVERSITYSEQ ASC) A LIMIT #{start}, 10
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ADMIN WHERE UNIVERSITYSEQ != 9999
SELECT UNIVERSITYSEQ AS universitySeq, UNIVERSITYNAME AS universityName, FROM UNIVERSITY WHERE UNIVERSITYSEQ != 9999
